text: Teen Titans Go! is an American television show. It airs on Cartoon Network. It first aired on April 23, 2013. It is currently airing its 8th season. It is a spin-off of Teen Titans. The production companies of the series are DC Entertainment and Warner Bros. Animation, with the animation outsourced to first and second seasons of United States at Digital eMation, AKOM and Rough Draft Korea in traditionaly animation and the third season onwards of Canada at Copernicus Studios and Bardel Entertainment in flash animation. 4 movies based on the show were released in 2018, 2019, 2021, and 2022. ==Plot== Superhero roommates Robin, Cyborg, Starfire, Raven and Beast Boy love saving the day, but what happens when they're done fighting crime? ==Characters== *Robin - The leader with a red shirt with an "R" symbol on his chest, green sleeves and gloves, green pants, black and gray boots, a yellow black robe, and a black and white mask. He uses bow staffs, grappling tips, katanas, and smoke bombs. *Starfire - The alien princess with green eyes, orange skin, hot pink hair, a necklace with a green eyeliner, pink eyebrows, large eyelashes, a violet cropped and skirt, iron gloves, a piece of iron on the neck and also purple boots that reach her ankles. == References == Category:2013 American television series debuts Category:Cartoon Network series Category:Parody television shows
title: Teen Titans Go!
